Comments_List:
About premodern Atlantic history, with a wide range of topics, including politics, economy, slavery, piracy, etc.
Most importantly, I learned about comparative studies which offer me a new perspective of thinking problems
Reading materials are good. With two professors in class, we can get new perspectives of one question.
Yes, sure. It is a useful course for a brief and comprehensive understanding of topics in Atlantic history
